headline: A free web app to create, explore and generate color palettes
description:
Hi, HN.

I was struggling to get a color palette right for a small game I was making in Unity and decided I'd throw together something that gave me a few dials to play with. Naturally, when the proof of concept worked I began expanding it and then some every time I wanted more independent control.

It was initially born of frustration of not being able to do certain basic things in Photoshop, like invert HSV values independently. And if they were possible they were usually cumbersome.

Anyway, It's done it's job for me for now. So given that color related content seems to be popular here - and I've never contributed a piece of software to the world - I thought I'd upload it to the web "as is" for free and perhaps someone else might find it useful. Any feedback is appreciated and if there is enough demand I might continue working on.

Thanks for your time.
